scripts.build-android: node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --config .kitserializer.js --bundle-output ./build/android/wchat.platform.bundle --assets-dest assets
scripts.build-ios: node node_modules/react-native/local-cli/cli.js bundle --platform ios --dev false --entry-file index.js --config .kitserializer.js --bundle-output ./build/ios/wchat.platform.bundle --assets-dest assets
